analysis.description:
Gimli.transferGIM uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(tx.origin == _from) (/unique_chucks/4/0xae4f56f072c34c0a65b3ae3e4db797d831439d93.sol)

GimliCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0xae4f56f072c34c0a65b3ae3e4db797d831439d93.sol#255-275) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= START_DATE && block.timestamp <= END_DATE) (/unique_chucks/4/0xae4f56f072c34c0a65b3ae3e4db797d831439d93.sol#256-258)

GimliCrowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/4/0xae4f56f072c34c0a65b3ae3e4db797d831439d93.sol#278-293) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > END_DATE || crowdsaleCanceled || balances[this] == 0) (/unique_chucks/4/0xae4f56f072c34c0a65b3ae3e4db797d831439d93.sol#280)

GimliCrowdsale.preAllocate (/unique_chucks/4/0xae4f56f072c34c0a65b3ae3e4db797d831439d93.sol#301-310) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < START_DATE) (/unique_chucks/4/0xae4f56f072c34c0a65b3ae3e4db797d831439d93.sol#304-306)

GimliCrowdsale.releaseVesting (/unique_chucks/4/0xae4f56f072c34c0a65b3ae3e4db797d831439d93.sol#312-333) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > VESTING_1_DATE && vesting1Withdrawn == false (/unique_chucks/4/0xae4f56f072c34c0a65b3ae3e4db797d831439d93.sol#314-321)
	- block.timestamp > VESTING_2_DATE && vesting2Withdrawn == false (/unique_chucks/4/0xae4f56f072c34c0a65b3ae3e4db797d831439d93.sol#321-331)
